text: Jonas Arweiler (born 10 April 1997) is a German footballer who plays as a forward for Eredivisie club ADO Den Haag on loan from FC Utrecht. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Borussia Dortmund II |2015–16 |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Regionalliga West |1||0||0||0||0||0||1||0 |- |2016–17 |30||5||0||0||0||0||30||5 |- |2017–18 |10||0||0||0||0||0||10||0 |- !colspan="2"|Borussia Dortmund II total !41!!5!!0!!0!!0!!0!!41!!5 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Jong FC Utrecht |2018–19 |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Eerste Divisie |29||5||0||0||0||0||29||5 |- |2019–20 |26||10||0||0||0||0||26||10 |- !colspan="2"|Jong FC Utrecht total !55!!15!!0!!0!!0!!0!!55!!15 |- |rowspan="1" valign="center"|FC Utrecht |2019–20 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Eredivisie |3||1||0||0||0||0||3||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !99!!21!!0!!0!!0!!0!!99!!21 |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile at DFB.de * Profile at kicker.de * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Püttlingen Category:German footballers Category:Germany youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Borussia Dortmund II players Category:Jong FC Utrecht players Category:FC Utrecht players Category:ADO Den Haag players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Eredivisie players Category:German expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands Category:Footballers from Saarland
